title: An excellent ballad intituled, the unfortunate love of a Lancashire gentleman, and the hard fortune of a faire young bride The tune is, Come follow my love.
publisher: printed for Francis Coles, T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson,
notes: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives a range of dates: 1658-1664.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
